title: Tropical Escape
description: Tropical EscapeBook OneTropical Escape SeriesAfter finding the courage after ten long months, twenty-seven-year-old, Lorna Hamlin break off her engagement. Lorna needs to get away Seattle to regroup and find out what she wants out of life. When offered a chance to take a free two-week vacation, Lorna and her best friend, Jackie, jump at the chance. The two hop on a plane to the beautiful Hawaiian island of Oahu.All too soon though, it has become clear to Lorna that this has become more than a relaxing two-week vacation. Soon danger is lurking at every street corner and Lorna’s only has once chance for survival. Lorna must put her trust in man she has just met. She realizes though that the real danger isn’t from her stalker. The real danger Lorna is about to face is losing her heart to her handsome Hawaiian hero.
author: Anne Marie Beck
